Interface CustomTaskRepository

All Known Subinterfaces:
TaskRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomTaskRepositoryImpl
public interface CustomTaskRepository
Custom repository interface for advanced task queries and operations.

Provides methods for paginated and filtered task retrieval as well as updating task assignments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView>
    findTaskWithPaginationAndFilter(long size, long page, String userId, Status status, LocalDateTime fromTime, LocalDateTime toTime)
    Retrieves tasks with pagination and optional filtering by user, status, and date range.
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<com.mongodb.client.result.UpdateResult>
    unassignUserTask(String userId, String taskId)
    Unassigns a specific task from a specific user.
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<com.mongodb.client.result.UpdateResult>
    unassignUserTasks(String userId)
    Unassigns all tasks currently assigned to a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • findTaskWithPaginationAndFilter

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView> findTaskWithPaginationAndFilter(long size, long page, String userId, Status status, LocalDateTime fromTime, LocalDateTime toTime)
      Retrieves tasks with pagination and optional filtering by user, status, and date range.
      Parameters:
      size - the number of tasks per page
      page - the page number (zero-based)
      userId - optional ID of the user to filter tasks by
      status - optional status to filter tasks by
      fromTime - optional lower bound for task creation date
      toTime - optional upper bound for task creation date
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting a TaskWithPaginationAndFilterView containing tasks and count information

    • unassignUserTasks

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<com.mongodb.client.result.UpdateResult> unassignUserTasks(String userId)
      Unassigns all tasks currently assigned to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose tasks will be unassigned
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting an UpdateResult with the update result

    • unassignUserTask

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<com.mongodb.client.result.UpdateResult> unassignUserTask(String userId, String taskId)
      Unassigns a specific task from a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      taskId - the ID of the task to unassign
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting an UpdateResult with the update result
